message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I get slightly more to account for future inflation.

I understand you want an even split, but inflation will hurt you more than me. I'm lowering my demand slightly.
I'm sticking with my previous offer. Let's be fair, and if we can't agree, we'll both lose money.

Alice, we're running out of time.  We both lose if we don't agree.  Let's split it evenly and end this game.
